Class.ClassComment: TupleRawComparator /** * This interface is intended to compare Tuples. The semantics of Tuple comparison must take into account null values in different ways. According to SQL semantics nulls are not equal. But for other Pig/Latin statements nulls must be grouped together. This interface allows to check if there are null fields in the tuples compared using this comparator. This method is meaningful only when the tuples are determined to be equal by the {@link #compare(byte[],int,int,byte[],int,int)} method. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Checks if one of the compared tuples had a null field. This method is meaningful only when {@link #compare(byte[],int,int,byte[],int,int)} has returned a zero value (i.e. tuples are determined to beequal). * @return true if one of the compared tuples had a null field, false otherwise. */
